//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "run_truck", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	use ( "truck_guy01" );
	use ( "truck_guy02" );
	set ( "SET_TASK_SPEED", "9 - FastRun" );

	task ( "run" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "truck_run02" );
	}

	dowait ( "run" );
	set ( "SET_TALK_TO", "player" );
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
}
